t: Matthew 19
The Question of Divorce
When*p Jesus had finished saying these things, he departed from Galilee and went to the region of Judea across the Jordan.
Large crowds followed him, and he healed them there.
Some Pharisees approached him to test him. They asked, “Is it lawful for a man to divorce his wife on any grounds?”
“Haven’t*rp you*r read,”*r he replied, “that*r he*r who*r created*r them*r in*r the*r beginning*r made*ir them*ir male*ir and*ir female,*ir

and*r he*r also*r said,*r ‘For*ir this*ir reason*ir a*ir man*ir will*ir leave*ir his*ir father*ir and*ir mother*ir and*ir be*ir joined*ir to*ir his*ir wife,*ir and*ir the*ir two*ir will*ir become*ir one*ir flesh’?*ir

Just*p then someone came up and asked him, “Teacher, what good must I do to have eternal life?”

honor*ir your*ir father*ir and*ir your*ir mother;*ir and*ir love*ir your*ir neighbor*ir as*ir yourself.*ir
